questionListItems.title: What is in the QR code in the MyPAssion App?

answer.body: The QR code contains the CAN number which is the 16-digit number found at the back (bottom half) of your physical card.

questionListItems.title: Can I select the QR code to be displayed in my PAssion Mobile App?

answer.body: Yes. Under the e-Card module, you can swipe to your preferred PAssion e-Card and the corresponding QR code for the selected card will be displayed.

questionListItems.title: How can I replace my PAssion card?

answer.body: You may refer to further instructions/information under the "I need a card replacement" section under the "Need Help" tab in your PAssion e-Card.

questionListItems.title: How do I book PA facilities using the app?

answer.body:
You are able to book the following facilities via MyPAssion app: Badminton Court, Table Tennis Room, Basketball Court, Squash Court, Tennis Court, Futsal Court, Soccer Field and BBQ Pit.

To book a facility, simply select the facility and your preferred CC. You are able to book the facility 15 days in advance. You can book up to 2 facility slots per day. The app accepts payment via VISA and MASTERCARD debit and credit cards.

questionListItems.title: How do I apply a promo code/ discount when booking facilities via the app?

answer.body: For usage of promo codes for the booking of facilities, you can apply the valid promo code for discount during check-out.

questionListItems.title: How can I view my YUU points or link my PAssion card to YUU reward club?

answer.body: You can click on the yuu Rewards Club logo in your PAssion e-Card page to view your yuu Points. If you have not linked your PAssion Card to yuu Rewards Club, you can do so by downloading the YUU Rewards Club app from App and Google Play stores.

questionListItems.title: How can I retrieve my PAssion card CAN number for linking my account to YUU rewards club?

answer.body: You can retrieve your PAssion Card CAN number from the e-Card module in MyPAssion app. Simply click on the logo shown next to the CAN number to copy your PAssion Card CAN number to yuu App.

questionListItems.title: Why do I need to update the app?

answer.body: New features and functionalities will be added to the app on a regular basis and downloading the updates would allow you to access these new features and functionalities.

questionListItems.title: What are the minimum android and ios versions required to use the MyPAssion mobile app?

answer.body: For Android phone users, Android 7.1 onwards and for iPhone users, iOS 13 onwards.

questionListItems.title: Are there any app permission required for the app?

answer.body: The app may request access to your phone calendar, telephone, storage and location etc. Please review the app permissions before downloading the app via the App and Google Play stores.

questionListItems.title: How can I find out more about the PAssion card programme?

answer.body: You can log on to https://www.onepa.gov.sg/passion-card to find out more about the PAssion Membership programme.

questionListItems.title: I need help with the MyPAssion app. What should I do?

answer.body: You may call the PA Contact Centre at 6225 5322 (8am to 6pm, Mondays to Sundays, excluding Public Holidays). Alternatively, you may also send your feedback via the "Feedback" tab within the app.

The PAssion Card is a membership card for members of the People's Association including PA Grassroots Leaders and members of Community Clubs (CCs) / PAssion WaVe. The PAssion Card is more than just another membership or discount card. It serves the unique purpose of connecting you with your community by offering you a host of exciting and wholesome activities. For more information, please visit https://www.onepa.gov.sg/passion-card.

questionListItems.title: What are the benefits and features of the PAssion card?

answer.body:
Members will get to enjoy great discounts on courses and activities available at all Community Clubs and other PA outlets such as PAssion WaVe. Members can also enjoy exclusive discounts at more than 2,000 participating PAssion Merchant outlets.


In summary, the PAssion Card allows members to:

  • Enjoy Members' Rates and privileges at all the CCs and other PA outlets;

  • Enjoy discounts at other PA outlets like PAssion WaVe outlets, PA concerts, Chingay Parade Singapore as well as some other activities and facilities under PA;

  • Enjoy discounts/ privileges at over 2,000 PAssion Merchant outlets recruited by PA;

  • Earn yuu Points and enjoy amazing offers and rewards at over 1,000 places which include Cold Storage, CS Fresh, Guardian Health & Beauty, 7-Eleven, Giant, BreadTalk, Toast Box, Butter Bean, Food Junction, Food Republic, Food Opera, ThyeMoh Chan, Mandai Wildlife Reserve (home to Singapore's wildlife parks including Singapore Zoo, River Wonders, Night Safari and Jurong Bird Park) and Singtel;

  • Enjoy complimentary 5-year National Library Board (NLB) Partner Membership (Applicable to Singaporeans and PRs only); and

  • Enjoy exclusive privileges on eCapitaVoucher and deals on the CapitaStar App.


As the PAssion Card doubles up as an EZ-Link card, the easy contactless payment function of the card enables the payment for:

  • CC and PAssion WaVe courses

  • Transit services (e.g. MRT, Taxi and Bus);

  • Motoring charges (e.g. ERP charges, only for 2nd Generation IU);

  • Retail and services (e.g. 7-Eleven, NLB etc)

questionListItems.title: If I apply for the PAssion card online, when can I start to enjoy the member's rate at PA? How long do I have to wait and how do I collect the card?

answer.body: No self-collection is needed as the card will be sent to your mailing address within 2-3 weeks. You may start to enjoy the member's rate at PA outlets once online payment for the application of PAssion Card is successful. For online transaction at www.onepa.gov.sg, you can start enjoying the Member's rate once you log in and transact for PA courses/ activities as after a successful application.
